attributes.action: Stop water cremation waste water being released into the water system!
attributes.background: Find a different use for the water to save it being released into our water system or stop the process completely.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do as it is not clear if you want a ban or restriction on how waste water from this process is processed and/or disposed of. 

For more information on how waste water is currently treated and rules on standards for water for domestic use, there are some links below for guidance: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/wastewater-treatment-in-england

https://www.water.org.uk/guidance/principles-of-water-supply-hygiene/

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Please note that if you would like to start a new petition, you will need to provide your full name.
